name: milestone-fireworks
author: TejaswaniRai
preview: A fun and interactive component that displays animated fireworks on the Helixque user map whenever global user milestones are reached (like 10k, 50k, 100k users). Works in dark and light mode. Animation is non-blocking and highlights regions contributing most to the milestone. Optional toggleable sound effects. Fully responsive.

props.name: isActive
props.description: Whether the fireworks animation is currently active

props.name: regions
props.type: Array<{x: number, y: number, intensity: number}>
props.description: Array of regions with coordinates and intensity for fireworks placement

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the fireworks animation in milliseconds

props.name: onComplete
props.description: Callback function called when animation completes

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the container

props.name: soundEnabled
props.description: Whether to enable optional sound effects during the celebration

props.name: autoTrigger
props.description: Whether to automatically trigger fireworks at milestone thresholds
